casebody.data:
Rufus SPEARMAN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

James B. Streeto, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Denise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Rufus Spearman's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 164 Conn.App. 530, 138 A.3d 378 (2016), is denied.
